publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3478 Mr Gil Paterson: Listen Louder Campaign—That the Parliament congratulates Scottish Women’s Aid on its "Listen Louder" campaign, which aims to highlight the lack of services available to young people that have experienced domestic abuse in Scotland and the effect domestic abuse has on children and calls on the Scottish Executive to evaluate the current provision of services, in order to ascertain what further service provision is needed.

S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Bruce Crawford*, Alex Fergusson*, Ms Sandra White*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Brian Adam*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr John McAllion*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Jackie Baillie*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Alex Neil*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Elaine Smith*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Tommy Sheridan*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Susan Deacon*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Scott Barrie*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3478 Listen Louder Campaign (lodged on 9 October 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
